mapper.select:
SELECT a.id, a.company_id, a.project_no, a.project_name as projectName, (select company_name from maoding_web_company c1 WHERE c1.id=a.company_id) as companyName FROM maoding_web_project a left join maoding_web_project_task c on a.id=c.project_id and c.task_status='0' LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_member d on a.id = d.project_id and d.deleted=0 and d.company_user_id=#{companyUserId} WHERE a.pstatus='0' and (a.company_id = #{companyId} or a.company_bid = #{companyId} or c.company_id = #{companyId} or c.from_company_id = #{companyId})
and a.project_name like '%' #{searchVal} '%'
and (d.id is not null)
group by a.id

SELECT a.id, a.company_id, a.company_bid, a.project_name, a.status, b.user_name, a.create_by, b.id, (SELECT company_name from maoding_web_company f where f.id = a.company_id ) as company_name, IF(d.id is NOT null,1,IF(f.id is not null,2,0)) as flag FROM maoding_web_project a left join maoding_web_company_user b on a.create_by = b.user_id and a.company_id = b.company_id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_task c on a.id = c.project_id and c.task_status='0' LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_member d on a.id = d.project_id and d.deleted=0 and d.company_user_id=#{companyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LEFT JOIN maoding_web_attention f on a.id = f.target_id and f.company_user_id = #{companyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE a.pstatus='0' and (a.company_id = #{appOrgId} or a.company_bid = #{appOrgId} or c.company_id = #{appOrgId} or c.from_company_id = #{appOrgId})
and (d.id is not null)
and (f.id is not null)
and (d.id is not null or f.id is not null)
and a.project_name like '%' #{projectName} '%'
and POSITION(a.id in #{idList})
and a.status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
group by a.id order by a.project_create_date DESC,a.create_date DESC,a.project_name desc
limit #{startPage},#{endPage}

SELECT count(DISTINCT a.id) FROM maoding_web_project a LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_task c on a.id = c.project_id and c.task_status='0' LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_member d on a.id = d.project_id and d.deleted=0 and d.company_user_id=#{companyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LEFT JOIN maoding_web_attention f on a.id = f.target_id and f.company_user_id = #{companyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE a.pstatus='0' and (a.company_id = #{appOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or a.company_bid = #{appOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or c.company_id = #{appOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

SELECT a.id,a.project_name as projectName,
IF(d.id is NOT null,1,IF(f.id is not null,2,0)) as flag,
if(a.company_id=#{companyId},1,if(a.company_bid =#{companyId},2,3)) as relationType FROM maoding_web_project a LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_task c on a.id = c.project_id and c.task_status !='1'
LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_member d on a.id = d.project_id and d.deleted=0 and d.company_user_id= #{companyUserId} LEFT JOIN maoding_web_attention f on a.id = f.target_id and f.company_user_id = #{companyUserId}
WHERE a.pstatus='0' and (a.company_id =#{companyId} or a.company_bid =#{companyId} or c.company_id = #{companyId} or c.from_company_id = #{companyId})
and (d.id is not null or f.id is not null )
group by a.id
limit #{startPage},#{endPage}

SELECT sum(if(a.status=0,1,0)) as myProjectCount,sum(if(a.status=2,1,0)) as attentionCount from (SELECT a.id,a.status FROM maoding_web_project a LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_task c on a.id = c.project_id and c.task_status !='1' WHERE a.pstatus='0' and (a.company_id =#{companyId} or a.company_bid =#{companyId} or c.company_id = #{companyId} or c.from_company_id = #{companyId}) group by a.id )a

select count(1) as 'totalCount', sum(if(b.`status`=0,1,0)) as 'progressCount', sum(if(b.`status`=2,1,0)) as 'completeCount', sum(if(b.menber_id is not null ,1,0)) as 'partakeCount' , sum(if(b.menber_id is not null and b.`status`=0,1,0)) as 'partakeProgressCount', sum(if(b.menber_id is not null and b.`status`=2,1,0)) as 'partakeCompleteCount' from( SELECT a.id,d.id as menber_id,a.`status` FROM maoding_web_project a LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_task c on a.id = c.project_id and c.task_status='0' LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_member d on a.id = d.project_id and d.deleted=0 and d.company_user_id = #{companyUserId} WHERE a.pstatus='0' and (a.company_id = #{companyId} or a.company_bid = #{companyId} or c.company_id = #{companyId} ) GROUP BY a.id )b

select id, project_name as projectName, round(ifnull(sum(labor_hours),0),1) as totalLaborHours, ifnull(project_hours,0) as laborHours, if(labor_id is null,0,1) as isSelected from( SELECT a.id,a.project_name,e.labor_hours,f.labor_hours as project_hours,f.id as labor_id FROM maoding_web_project a LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_task c on a.id = c.project_id and c.task_status='0' LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_member d on a.id = d.project_id and d.deleted=0 LEFT JOIN maoding_web_labor_hour e on a.id = e.project_id and d.company_user_id = e.company_user_id and e.deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN maoding_web_labor_hour f on a.id = f.project_id and d.company_user_id = f.company_user_id and f.labor_date = #{currentDate} and f.deleted = 0 WHERE a.pstatus='0' and a.status = 0 and d.company_user_id = #{companyUserId} and (a.company_id = #{companyId} or a.company_bid = #{companyId} or c.company_id = #{companyId} ) GROUP BY a.id,e.id )b GROUP BY id
